name: NEND
description: NEND is a RWA refinancing protocol lowering risks intertwined with all financial activities. Every participant in the in NEND ecosystem has exposure to multiple yield opportunities while lowering impermanent loss risks protected by various unique tools and insurance funds. Its unique features like EABs and Trust Deeds along with leveraged loans against RWA help lenders, borrowers and stakers reduce their risks drastically.
